areas/rookie-harbor.json/floors/2/maps/3.note: related to Autumn's Rise, which will not be translated

areas/rookie-harbor.json/floors/2/maps/1.note: related to Autumn's Fall, which will not be translated

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/13.orig: Sorry lady, but no entry for you.
We're currently investigating a rather unpleasant animal incident here.
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/13.text: On est en train d'enquêter sur une mauvaise rencontre avec un animal.

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/41.orig: EVERYTHING IS OKAY! PLEASE ENJOY YOUR DAY!
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/41.text: TOUT VA BIEN ! PROFITEZ BIEN DE VOTRE JOURNÉE !

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/41.orig: I really wonder what's behind those boxes...
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/41.text: Je me demande vraiment ce qu'il y a derrière ces boites.

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/44.orig: Wow, that's quite the view. Didn't expect this.
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/44.text: Waouh, on a une jolie vue d'ici. Je m'y attendais pas.

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/44.orig: You can say that again. Look! You can even see all these weird ruins.
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/44.text: Ça tu peux le dire. Regarde ! On voit même ces drôles de ruines d'ici.
Je suis impatient d'aller les explorer.

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/44.orig: Small lass try'n to get in a secret club, aye?
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/44.text: La p'tit mad'moiselle essaie d'rentrer dans un club fermé, nan ?

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/44.orig: Sorry litt'l one, not gonna pass 'til some's gonna vouch for ya.
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/44.text: Désolé, ma p'tite, mais tu passeras pas sans un laissez-passer.

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.text: On voit pas ça souvent ici.

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.orig: I like this spot, always calms me down.
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.text: J'aime bien cet endroit. Ça me détend toujours.
Et je peux observer les gens.

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.orig: I see you got the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0] with you! Nice, nice!
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.text: Je vois que tu as le \c[3]Symbole de Flamme Rouge\c[0] avec toi ! Bien, bien !

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.orig: Well then, good luck on your journey!
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.text: Bon alors, bonne chance pour ton voyage !

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.orig: If you want to pass the barrier up ahead you first have to collect the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.text: Si tu veux passer la barrière plus loin, tu as besoin du \c[3]Symbole de Flamme Rouge\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.orig: You get it at the end of the \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], right after the boss battle.
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/45.text: Tu peux l'obtenir après la fin du \c[3]Temple de Faj'ro\c[0] juste après le boss.

maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/46.orig: Canst thou not see how I ponder?
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/46.text: N'êtes donc vous pas capable de voir que je réfléchis ?
maps/rookie-harbor/east.json/entities/46.note: this follows the insult generator (shakeit in gui langfile)

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Talatu Lips
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Talatu Lips

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Hey there darlin'!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Hé bonjour, mademoiselle !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Thanks again fer helpin' me with them plants!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Merci encore pour m'avoir aidé avec les plantes !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: It's been a pleasure takin' care o' them so far.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Ça a été un plaisir d'en prendr' soin.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Thanks to some modern techno doodads Ah can keep 'em on display like that.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Et avec ces machins technologiques de maintenant, je peux les guarder à l'oeil.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.note: this de, en is like les montrer ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Talatu Lips
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Talatu Lips

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Welcome to mah cozy greenhouse y'all!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Bienv'nue dans ma p'tite serre tout l'monde !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Don't be shy now, darlin'. Here's where all yer hard workin' pays off.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Ne sois pas timide, mad'moiselle. C'est à ça qu'tout ton travail a servi.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Talatu Lips
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Talatu Lips

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Y'all like it?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Ça t'plait ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Y'all did all the hard work, really.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: C'est plutôt à moi d'te r'mercier, en fait !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Ah was able to preserve all o' them precious flora y'all kept hittin'.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Ici j'peux conserver toute' ces plantes précieuses qu'vous passiez vot' temps à frapper.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Even them weird ones...
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Mêmes les plus marrantes...

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: What Ah'm try'na say is: Thanks, Seeker.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Tout'c'que j'veux dire pas là c'est : Merci pisteuse !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Y'all helped me fulfill mah dream and words can't say how much that means to me.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: T'm'a tell'ment aidé à réaliser mon rêve que j'sais même pas trouver les mots pour t'dire à quel point c'est important pour moi.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Well, guess it's time ta give that strawhat one last upgrade, dont'cher think?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Bon, il est temps de t'filer encore une évolution de c'te chapeau, t'pense pas ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: \i[item-helm-unique]\v[item.469.name]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: \i[item-helm-unique]\v[item.469.name]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Talatu Lips
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Talatu Lips

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Thanks!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Merci !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Oh and take this too, will ya.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Ah et prends donc ça aussi.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.orig: Y'all drop in whenever ya feel like!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tala.json/entit.text: Tu peux rev'nir quand tu veux si tu passes dans l'coin.

maps/rookie-harbor/north.json/entities/3.orig: Well hey there, if it ain't the master botanist herself!
maps/rookie-harbor/north.json/entities/3.text: Hé, bonjour, si ce n'est pas madame la maitre botaniste !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/4.text:
\i[arrow-n] Place du Marché
\i[arrow-s] Arcade des Débutants

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: PNJ Bateau
Bienvenue à Rookie Harbor !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Hey!\. It's nice here in the shade, isn't it?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Hé !\. C'est bien ici à l'ombre, non ?
... Salut ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Your friend's still not here. What's the holdup?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ton ami est toujours pas là. Il fait quoi ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I dunno... he said he'd arrive around this time.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je sais pas... Il a dit qu'il arriverait dans ces eaux-là.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Maybe he's stuck in Rhombus Square, watching the city from afar... you know how it is...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Peut-être qu'il est encore à Rhombus Square, en train d'admirer la ville de loin... Tu sais comment il est...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Yeah... Can't wait to finally enter that place, too!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ouais... Moi aussi je suis impatient d'aller là-dedans !
... Salut !
... Oh ! Hé !
Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ... Oh well... Ever notice how that tree has fruit?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ... Bon OK... Tu as déjà remarqué que cet arbre avait des fruits ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I heard those are not instant matter but actual fruit!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: J'ai cru comprendre que ce n'était pas de l'instant-matière, mais des vrais fruits !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Now I really wonder how they taste...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Maintenant je me demande vraiment quel goût ils ont...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oh well... it's not like you can eat real-life fruit as an avatar.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Oui bon, C'est pas comme si c'était possible de manger des vrais fruits en tant qu'avatar...
[acquiesce]
... Salut !
Coucou toi.
... Tu as l'air vraiment perdue...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: If you're waiting for somebody, this is the right spot.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Si tu attends quelqu'un, c'est l'endroit idéal.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Pretty much everyone here is waiting for new players arriving from Cross Central.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Un peu tout le monde ici attend des nouveaux joueurs qui viennent de Cross Central.
C'est un point de rencontre connu.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ... You seem to be a new player, too. So you know what I mean, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ... Tu as l'air d'être aussi un nouveau joueur. Donc tu dois savoir de quoi je parle, non ?
[acquiesce]
... T'es plutôt silencieuse, à ce que je vois.
Bon sang, ils sont où ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: C'mon, relax. There is still time.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est bon, calme-toi. On a encore le temps.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: The raid is scheduled in 10 minutes.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Le Raid est prévu dans 10 minutes.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Nothing is planned. It's going to be a mess...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: On a rien préparé du tout. Ça va être un désastre...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Don't be so serious about it. It's supposed to be fun, remember?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Pas besoin d'en faire un drame. C'est un jeu, on est censé s'amuser, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: All that water... makes you want to jump right into it!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Toute cette eau... Ça donne envie de sauter dedans !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Not sure I'd do that with your amount of armor.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Pas sûr que ça soit une bonne idée vu ton armure.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Also, you'd just dissolve and respawn.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: En plus tu vas juste te dissoudre et réapparaitre.
CasseJoie

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Mh... I swear there was an entrance here...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mmm... J'étais sûr qu'il y avait une entrée ici...
Hé !\. Par ici !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Look at all these old style buildings!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Regarde un peu toutes ces vielles maisons !
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.note: de:cottage, which, in french, is chaumiere, so no.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's like we are in some kind of medieval fantasy world, non?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est comme si on était dans une sorte d'univers médiéval fantastique, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: So...\. Right now I'm waiting here to meet a friend.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Sinon...\. Là maintenant, j'attends un ami.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: But I haven't seen him so far.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mais pour l'instant je l'ai pas encore vu.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: There are just so many people here...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Il y a juste trop de monde ici...
HOLERÖ !\.\.
Ahhh !
Gyahahaha !
Sacrebleu !\. T'étais vraiment obligé de faire ça ?
Oui, c'était obligé.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I see you brought a friend?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je vois que tu as amenée une amie ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Ah oui, that's Lea!\. I met her during the tutorial.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ah oui, c'est Lea !\. Je l'ai rencontrée pendant les tutoriels.
Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: And this dark lord meanie here is \c[3]Lukas\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Et ce méchant seigneur des ténèbres là, c'est \c[3]Lukas\c[0].
Aussi connu sous le nom de \c[3]Schneider\c[0].
Ravi de te rencontrer, Lea !
[acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: So you finally reached the \c[3]Croissant\c[0].\. Having fun so far?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Donc vous êtes finalement arrivé sur le \c[3]Croissant\c[0].\. Ça vous a plu pour l'instant ?
Oui, énormément !
Attends...\. Croissant ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: The mainland.\. You'll get the idea once you see the map.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Le continent.\. Tu comprendras quand tu verras la carte.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Anyway, this is \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0].\. It's known for the incoming shipments of rookies like you.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: En tout cas, ici c'est \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0].\. Une ville connue pour ses arrivages réguliers de petits nouveaux comme vous.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's also a fairly big place, which tends to be confusing for said rookies.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est aussi un lieu assez grand, où ces-dit nouveaux ont tendance à se perdre.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: So I thought I'd give you a small tour!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Donc je me disais que je pourrais vous faire faire un petit tour pour montrer un peu l'endroit !
Très bien !\. Après toi !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: \c[3]Schneider\c[0] is kind enough to show you around Rookie Harbor. Just follow him together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: \c[3]Schneider\c[0] est si gentil qu'il va vous faire visiter Rookie Harbor. Suivez-le avec \c[3]Emilie\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Ah I see, you now can open the golden chests.\. Congrats!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ah, je vois que tu peux ouvrir les coffres en or.\. Félicitations !
Lea !
Tu te poses des questions sur ce coffre, hm ?
[acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Yeah you can't open it yet.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ouais, tu peux pas encore l'ouvrir.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: But you will be able to do it later in the game.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mais plus tard dans le jeu, tu pourras l'ouvrir.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: You might want to add a \c[3]stamp\c[0] on your \c[3]map\c[0] to remember it.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Peut-être que tu devrais poser un \c[3]marqueur\c[0] sur ta \c[3]carte\c[0] pour ne pas oublier ce trésor.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: In case you don't know what I mean, just have a closer look at the \c[3]map menu\c[0]!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Au cas où tu ne comprendrais pas de quoi je parle, regarde mieux ton \c[3]menu carte\c[0] !
Oh, un cadeau ? pour moi ?
[acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Thanks! I don't know why, but lately random people just give me stuff for free.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Merci ! Je ne sais pas pourquoi, mais ces derniers temps, plein de gens que je connais pas me donnent des trucs.
J'adore ça !
Tout d'abord, le \c[3]Bâtiment d'information\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: If you really want to dig into all the details of CrossWorlds, this is your place.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Si vous voulez vraiment connaître tous les détails de CrossWorlds, c'est là qu'il faut être.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Combat arts, skills, all the stats from A to Z, you name it.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Arts de combats, Circuits, Toutes les stats de A à Z, tout ce que vous voulez.
Oh !\. C'est le "Repère des Intellos", non ?
Ja, les gens l'appellent comme ça.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Frankly, it's a good thing to know about all that stuff.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mais franchement, c'est utile de connaitre tout ça.
Mais ce n'est vraiment pas obligatoire.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's just a place to go back to whenever you're confused about something.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est juste un bon endroit où aller si vous ne comprenez pas quelque chose.
Allez on continue !
D'ailleurs...\. "Emilienator"?\. C'est bien trouvé.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I know!\. What's "Schneider" supposed to mean?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je sais !\. Et euh...\. Pourquoi "Schneider" ?
Je suis un \c[3]Triblader\c[0].\. Je tranche des trucs.
...\. Hein ?
Pas la peine d'expliquer.
Ohhh...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oi, Lea!\. Why are you running away?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Hé, Lea !\. Pourquoi tu t'enfuies ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I promise, I'll make it short!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je serai pas long, c'est promis !
Carlos la Carotte
Carlos la Carotte
Salut !
Ahh !\. E... Encore toi ?
[acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Okay... I guess that's the end of the line then.\. It's really a shame...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: OK... J'imagine qu'on arrive à la fin du rouleau.\. C'est vraiment dommage...
... que tu sois si lent !!\.\. Byeeeee\..\..\..

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: Man, there are markets literally everywhere in this town.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: Mec, il y a vraiment des marchés partout dans cette ville.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: I know, right? The city plaza is filled with market stands!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: Oui, Je sais. Cette place est remplie d'étals !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: And there is another market in the northern part, too.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: Et il y a encore un autre marché dans la partie nord de la ville.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: You can find a lot of rare stuff there, I heard.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: J'ai entendu qu'on peut y trouver des trucs vraiment rares là-bas.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: Nobody told me that CrossWorlds is essentially a part-time shopping spree...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: Personne m'a prévenu que jouer à CrossWorlds consistait à faire du shopping la moitié du temps...
Pourtant, ça on peut le dire !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: ... Now I really feel like bashing some hedgehags.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: ... Mais maintenant j'aurais bien envie de dégommer quelques harissons.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.note: bouter would be the proper term, but it's not jeanne d'arc

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: ... for a change of pace, you know?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: ... Pour varier un peu, pour faire autre chose, tu comprends ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: I'm afraid this resting spot is for one person only.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: Je crains que cette place ne soit que pour une personne.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.orig: Go look for another crate. This one is mine.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/31.text: Va chercher une autre caisse. Celle-là elle est pour moi.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Where is Ark?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Où est Ark ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Good question, I'd like to leave ASAP. I have some errands to run later.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Bonne question, je voudrais bien y aller maintenant, parce qu'il faut que je m'occupe d'autres trucs plus tard.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: He's probably chilling at that chest in the center again.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Il est sûrement encore en train de trainer à côté du coffre au centre.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Bugging people about how they should "claim their prize".
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: En train de raconter aux gens qu'ils feraient mieux de "prendre ce qu'ils méritent".

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Sounds like him for sure.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Ça serait tout lui, ça.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Is everyone ready to go?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Tout le monde est prêt à y aller ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Really? I just arrived! Let's rest for a while.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Euh, déjà ? Je viens juste d'arriver ! Laisse nous nous reposer un peu.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Man, you were just chillin' at the chest right?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Mec, t'étais encore en train de trainer autour du coffre, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Well... \! Yeah kinda...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Euh... \! Oui, mais pas longtemps...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Figures...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Bien sûr...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Hey! I was \c[5]helping this girl\c[0], you gotta believe me!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Hé ! J'étais juste en train \c[5]d'aider cette fille\c[0], tu peux me croire !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Oh hey! Thanks again for helping me out with my friends!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Tiens, salut ! Merci encore pour m'avoir aidé avec mes amis !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: I'll take that silent smile as a \c[3]No Problem\c[0], I guess.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Je vais prendre ce sourire silencieux comme un \c[3]Pas de problème\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Oh, it's you... Thanks for lying to my friends...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Oh, c'est toi... Merci beaucoup pour avoir menti à mes amis...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Oh! You're that girl I helped with the chest in the marketplace!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Oh ! Tu es cette fille que j'ai aidée avec le coffre au marché !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: See Hina, told you I was helping someone!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Tu vois, Hina, je t'avais bien dit que j'étais en train d'aider quelqu'un !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Is that so?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Oh, Est-ce bien vrai ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Alright alright, you win... \. \. this time.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Bon OK, je te crois...\. \.pour cette fois.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Phew!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Pfiou !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: I knew it. You're were slacking off again.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Je le savais. Tu étais encore en train de glander.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Aw, come on. Why would you do that? I wasn't slacking off, promise!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Rah, bon sang. Pourquoi est-ce que tu me reproches toujours quelque chose ? Je ne glandais pas, je te le promets !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: Yeah yeah, whatever.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: Oui oui, comme toujours.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: [nod]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: [acquiescer]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.orig: [shake head]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/34.text: [secouer la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Hello, I'm currently afk.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Bonjour, je suis actuellement absent.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: I'm expecting a delivery, so if you have something for me just leave it here.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: J'attends une livraison, donc si vous avez quelque chose pour moi, laissez-le ici.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Finally, this is the \c[3]west\c[0] part of the town.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Pour finir, voici la partie \c[3]ouest\c[0] de la ville.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: In this shop here you can buy \c[3]consumable items\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Dans ce magasin ici, vous pouvez acheter des \c[3]items consommables\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Further down you'll find an armory with basic \c[3]equipment\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: À la fin de cette rue, vous trouverez une armurerie avec de l'\c[3]équipement\c[0] basique.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: And when you continue to the west from here you'll enter \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Et si vous continuez à l'ouest d'ici, vous atteindrez \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: You'll find a lot of enemies along the way.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Vous trouverez pas mal d'ennemis en cours de route.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Be careful not to take on too many \c[3]Hedgehags\c[0] at once, or those guys will eat you for breakfast!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Faites attention de ne pas vous prendre trop de \c[3]harissons\c[0] à la fois, sinon ces bestioles vont vous avaler tout cru !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Anyway, just follow that way to get to \c[3]Bergen\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: En tout cas, prenez cette route pour aller à \c[3]Bergen\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: By the way, do you two want to form a party?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: D'ailleurs, vous deux, vous voulez pas former un groupe ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Oui, that would be great, right Lea?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Oui, ça serait cool, n'est-ce pas Lea ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: And you, Lukas?\. Will you travel with us, too?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Et toi, Lukas ?\. Tu nous accompagnes ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Hm...\. I unfortunately have to leave you soon.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Heu...\. Malheureusement je dois bientôt repartir.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Awww, already?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Oooh, déjà ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Trust me, it's not that fun to travel around with a high-level friend.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Crois-moi : Ce n'est pas très drôle de voyager avec des amis qui ont un niveau élevé.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Unless you don't care for the challenge.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Sauf si le challenge ne vous fait pas peur.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: But Lea is \c[1]high level\c[0] as well!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Mais Lea aussi a un \c[1]niveau élevé\c[0] !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Yes, and she'll snipe away all those enemies you'd like to attack as well.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Oui, et elle va te dégommer tous les ennemis sous ton nez.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Nah, I'm sure Lea will leave a few enemies for me, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Nan, je suis sûr que Lea va m'en laisser un peu, pas vrai ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Right...?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Pas vrai... ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: In any case...\. I have to head back to the guild.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: De toute façon...\. Il faut que je retourne dans la guilde.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: You could watch us take on those Hedgehags!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Tu pourrais nous regarder en train de nous écharper avec ces harissons !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Japp.\. That totally sounds like a lot of fun, doesn't it?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Japp.\. Ça serait vraiment super amusant à regarder, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: No really, I have to head back to the guild.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Non, vraiment, il faut que je retourne à la guilde.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: There is just too much stuff going on right now.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Il y a tellement de choses qui se passent en ce moment.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: The crap will be steaming if I'm gone for too long.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Si je pars trop longtemps, ça va finir par sentir mauvais.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.note: theres no acceptable substitute for that...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: I see, Monsieur is just too important for us rookies.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Je vois. Monsieur est trop important pour des petits nouveaux comme nous.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Oh, please don't be that way.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Roh, mais non, ne le prends pas comme ça.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: You can set up a \v[lore.unlock.direct-link.p1]\c[3]Direct Link\c[0] if something comes up, alright?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Vous pouvez ouvrir un \v[lore.unlock.direct-link.p1]\c[3]Direct Link\c[0] si vous avez besoin de quelque chose, OK ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Let's meet again once you reach Bergen Village.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: On pourra se revoir quand vous aurez atteint le Village de Bergen.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Come on, Lea.\. Let's do some leveling until we're worth the Dark Lord's attention!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Allez viens, Lea.\. Allons monter un peu de niveau jusqu'à que l'on mérite l'attention du Seigneur des Ténèbres !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Oh, Junge...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Oh, Junge...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: See you soon, Emilie!\. And you too, Lea!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: On se revoit, Emilie !\. Et toi aussi, Lea !
... Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: ...Huh?\. Oh well...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: ... Hein ?\. Bon OK...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Tschau, tschau!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Tschau, tschau !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Alright, party time!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Allez, il est temps de faire un groupe !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: So...\. where is the option...\. Ah, oui!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Bon...\. Elle est où l'option...\. Ah, oui !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Emilie
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Emilie

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Voilà! We just formed a party!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Voilà ! On a formé un groupe !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Alright, let's head to \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0]!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Allez, allons à \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Or maybe look for quests in town?\. I'll let you decide, Lea!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Ou peut-être qu'il faudrait faire quelques quêtes en ville ?\. Je te laisse choisir, Lea !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: This is so exciting!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: C'est tellement bien !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Party Members
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Membres du Groupe

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Learn about the party members, the Social menu and party strategy.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Découvrez les membres du groupe, le menu Groupe et les stratégies de groupe.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: The status of your party members is displayed below your own.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Le statut des membres de votre groupe sont affichés en dessous du vôtre.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: You can change the behavior of your party members via the \c[3]Party Strategy\c[0] menu.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Vous pouvez changer le comportement des membres du groupe via le menu \c[3]Stratégie de Groupe\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: The \c[3]Social Menu\c[0] is now unlocked.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Le \c[3]Menu Groupe\c[0] est maintenant déverrouillé.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Here you can see detailed stats of all your party members.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Ici vous pouvez voir les stats détaillées de vos compagnons.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Repeat?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Répéter ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Yes
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Oui

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: No
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Non

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.orig: Start your journey to \c[3]Bergen\c[0] together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/37.text: Démarrez votre voyage à deux avec \c[3]Emilie\c[0] jusqu'à \c[3]Bergen\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Howdy, partner!\. You sure look like a healthy gal who can appreciate a nice piece of meat.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut, partenaire !\. Tu m'as l'air d'être une bonne fille qui a l'air de savoir apprécier un bon morceau de viande.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Haha, I always sniff out good taste.\. It's, like, my special talent.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ha ! Je le savais !\. J'ai un bon nez pour reconnaitre les gens de bon goût.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: The name is Selena Teak and I have grand plans:\. To create the perfect steaks for everyone to enjoy!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mon nom est Selena Teak et j'ai un grand projet :\. De créer des steaks parfaits et d'en faire profiter tout le monde !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Lea!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Lea !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: At least that's what I want to do, but I still don't have the proper ingredients for that.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ça c'est ce que je cherche à faire, mais je n'ai pas encore trouvé les bons ingrédients pour ça.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: And since I can't just leave the city and search for them... Maybe you can help me with that?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Et vu que je ne peux pas juste quitter la ville et aller en chercher... Peut-être que tu pourrais m'aider là-dessus ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Girl, you are the best!\. It will be amazing, you won't regret it!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Trop sympa ! T'es la meilleure !\. Ça sera phénoménal ! Tu ne seras pas déçue !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Anyway, I definitely need some nice \c[3]Raw Meat\c[0] of course.\. The \c[3]Bovines\c[0] in \v[area.autumn-area.name] should do nicely!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: En tout cas, j'ai besoin bien sûr de \c[3]\v[item.88.name]\c[0].\. Les \c[3]Bovins\c[0] à \v[area.autumn-area.name] devraient convenir parfaitement !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Though I heard that you gotta have, like, \c[3]a good Rank\c[0] to get some meat from them.\. Whatever that means.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Bien que j'ai cru comprendre qu'il faut que tu aies \c[3]un bon rang\c[0] pour obtenir de la viande à partir d'eux.\. Peu importe ce que ça veut dire.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Then I need some firewood that brings out the taste perfectly.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ensuite il me faudrait du bois de braise pour relever correctement le goût.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: I don't know much about all the trees here but... best bring me some \c[3]very light\c[0] and also \c[3]some sharp\c[0] wood.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Je ne connais pas grand-chose sur les arbres d'ici, mais le mieux ce serait que tu me ramènes du bois \c[3]très léger\c[0] et un peu de bois \c[3]piquant\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: You should find both of them \c[3]on a mountain\c[0] somewhere. Good luck!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Tu devrais trouver les deux \c[3]sur une montagne\c[0] quelque part. Bonne chance !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Whaaaat, not interested?\. That's such a shame... just think of all the steaaaak!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Quoiiiii, tu n'es pas intéressée ?\. C'est dommage... Pense à tous ces steaaaaks !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Bring me some nice \c[3]Raw Meat\c[0], \c[3]very light\c[0] wood and \c[3]some sharp\c[0] wood.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Amène-moi de la bonne \c[3]\v[item.88.name]\c[0], du bois \c[3]très léger\c[0] et du bois \c[3]piquant\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: You can get the meat from \c[3]Bovines\c[0] with \c[3]a good Rank\c[0] and you can find the wood \c[3]somewhere on a mountain.\c[0]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Tu peux obtenir de la viande des \c[3]Bovins\c[0] avec \c[3]un bon rang\c[0] et tu peux trouver le bois \c[3]quelque part sur une montagne\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ah, howdy!\. You got everything!?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ah, salut !\. Tu as tout amené ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Amazing.\. That's, like, everything I asked for.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Chouette !\. Tu as vraiment tout ce que j'ai demandé.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Just stay right here, okay?\. I have to try out my recipe immediately.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Reste un peu ici, OK ?\. Je veux essayer ma recette tout de suite.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: That's... mhm... not what I wanted...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: C'est... mmm... pas ce que je voulais...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: The heat-balance was way off and the wood's fragrance didn't give the meat the taste I wanted...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: L'équilibre de la température n'était pas bon et la fragrance du bois n'a pas donné le goût que j'espérais à la viande...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: I'm sorry girl, but I can't use this.\. Not for the steak of my dreams.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Je suis désolé, mais je ne peux pas utiliser ça.\. Pas pour le steak de mes rêves.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: You will still get your reward, don't worry.\.  Just... for the steaks we will have to try something else next time.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Tu vas recevoir ta récompense, ne t'inquiète pas.\. C'est juste... que pour les steaks, il faudra essayer autre chose.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Don't worry, I will, like, think of something.\. Talk to me later if you wanna help me again.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, j'aurais rapidement une autre idée.\. Viens me voir un peu plus tard, si tu veux encore m'aider.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Bye...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Bye...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Hi...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Howdy girl, good to see you again.\. I think I figured out a better wood combination for grilling the steak.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut, partenaire ! C'est bon de te revoir.\. Je pense que j'ai trouvé une meilleure combinaison de sortes de bois pour fumer le steak.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Yeah, I'm pretty sure about it this time!\. Let's give this another try, shall we?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Oui, cette fois, j'en suis vraiment sûr !\. On peut réessayer ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Alright!\. It won't disappoint again, believe me!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Bon !\. Cette fois tu ne seras pas déçue, crois-moi !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: This time I wanna go with a mix of \c[3]very dense and regal wood from a mountain\c[0] and \c[3]wood that is extremely dry\c[0]!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Cette fois je veux essayer un mix de \c[3]bois noble très dense d'une montagne\c[0] et de \c[3]bois extrêmement sec\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: I guess you'd find the latter in, like, dry areas?\. Would make sense, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Je pense que tu trouveras ces derniers dans euh, une région sèche ?\. Ça serait logique, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Well, and of course I will need more raw meat again!\. You got everything?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ah et bien sûr, j'aurais besoin de plus de \c[3]\v[item.88.name]\c[0] !\. Tu as tout noté ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Great!\. So good luck finding everything.\. Think of the steaks!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Super !\. Alors bonne chance pour tes recherches.\. Pense aux steaks !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Awww, no trust left because of that one failure?\. Come on girl, I think we are onto something here!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Oh noon, c'est tout ? Tu n'as plus confiance dans notre affaire ?\. Après seulement un échec ?\. Allez, partenaire, je suis sûr qu'on va finir par y arriver !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Remember, aside from the meat I need different wood than the first try!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: N'oublie pas, outre qu'il me faut de la viande, j'ai besoin d'autre sortes de bois que la première fois !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: \c[3]Very dense and regal wood from a mountain\c[0] and \c[3]dry wood from, like, a desert \c[0] should do the trick!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Avec du \c[3]bois noble très dense d'une montagne\c[0] et du \c[3]bois très sec, genre venant presque d'un désert\c[0], on devrait y arriver !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Yay~, you are back again.\. And do I smell some nice meat and wood there?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Héé~, Tu es de nouveau de retour.\. Et est c'est de la bonne viande et de l'excellent bois que je sens ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Yes, that looks awesome!\. Let me have another try right now!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Oui, ça m'a l'air super !\. Laisse-moi essayer ça dès maintenant !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Mhmmmm...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mmmmm...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: This is...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: C'est...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig:
...absolutely perfect!!\.\.
The texture, the aroma!\. It is the perfect steak!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text:
... absolument parfait !!\.\.
La texture, l'arôme !\. C'est le steak parfait !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Thank you so much, girl!\. It never would've worked without those ingredients you brought me!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Milles merci !\. Sans les ingrédients que tu m'as apporté, ça n'aurait jamais marché !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Here, I'll give you the first batch of steaks to enjoy.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Tiens, les premiers steaks sont pour toi.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: You can get as many as you want from my booth here, as long as you bring the ingredients!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Je peux t'en faire autant que tu en veux, tant que tu m'apportes les bons ingrédients !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Bye!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Bye !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Howdy!\. Don't you love the smell of steak in the morning?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut !\. Toi aussi tu aimes la bonne odeur de steak au petit matin ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Or any other time, really.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Le matin ou à n'importe quelle heure, en fait.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Howdy, gal!\. Did you come by to check how business is going?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut, partenaire !\. Est-ce que tu viens voir comment vont les affaires ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Aw, how nice of ya.\. It's going great!\. Those steaks really hit the bullseye of people's tastebuds here.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ah, c'est gentil de ta part.\. Les affaires vont bien !\. Les steaks plaisent bien aux gens d'ici.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: But I talked to our valued customers and got some ideas to improve my precious meat even more.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mais j'ai parlé à plusieurs clients fidèles et j'ai des nouvelles idées pour améliorer encore plus mes steaks.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: How about it, gal?\. You feeling it in you to help me out again?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Qu'est-ce que t'en dis, partenaire ?\. Ça te dit de m'aider à nouveau ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Yeehaw, I knew I could count on you, my dear!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Yeehaa !\. Je savais que je pourrais compter sur toi !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Just like last time, it's all about the ingredients.\. I've done some research on the precious plants of the East!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: C'est comme la dernière fois, tout vient des ingrédients.\. J'ai fait quelques recherches sur les magnifiques plantes de l'est !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Once again, I'd like to try some new wood in combination with what we already got.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Et encore une fois, j'aimerais bien essayer des nouvelles sortes de bois, en combinaison avec ceux qu'on a déjà conservé.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: So please bring me some \c[3]old wood\c[0] from the \c[3]jungle in the north-east\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Donc apporte-moi s'il te plaît du \c[3]vieux bois\c[0] qui vient de la \c[3]jungle du nord-est\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: I also want to experiment a bit with marinating the meat before grilling.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: J'aimerais bien aussi expérimenter un peu et faire mariner les steaks avant de les griller.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: For that I would love to get my hands on some \c[3]honey\c[0] and a bunch of \c[3]sweet apples\c[0]!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Pour ça, j'ai besoin de mettre la main sur du \c[3]miel\c[0] et une portion de \c[3]pommes sucrées\c[0] !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: You should find all of that in \v[area.autumn-fall.name] in the east or that jungle I mentioned!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Tu devrais trouver tout ça à l'est de \v[area.autumn-fall.name] ou dans cette jungle dont j'ai déjà parlé !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: As for the meat, I still got a lot of that here to experiment.\. Is everything else clear?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Et pour la viande, j'en ai déjà suffisamment pour pouvoir expérimenter ici.\. Tout est clair pour l'instant ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Alright!\. Then give it your all.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: OK !\. Alors fait de ton mieux !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Bye!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Bye !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Awwwww, really?\. You're already satisfied with what we got?\. Think of the possibilities!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ohhh nooon, vraiment pas ?\. Tu es déjà satisfaite de ce qu'on a déjà ?\. pense à toutes les possibilités futures !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Get me some \c[3]old wood\c[0] from the \c[3]jungle in the east\c[0] and some ingredients for the marinade.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Apporte-moi un peu de \c[3]vieux bois\c[0] de la \c[3]jungle à l'est\c[0] et quelques ingrédients pour la marinade.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Some \c[3]honey\c[0] and a bunch of \c[3]sweet apples\c[0] from the East should do nicely!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Du \c[3]miel\c[0] et une portion de \c[3]pommes fruitées\c[0] de l'Est seraient idéals pour ça !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Gal, you're back!\. And what is that?\. Do I see some of the most perfect ingredients that have ever been found?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Ah, tu es encore de retour, partenaire ! Est-ce que je vois ce que je vois ?\. Est-ce les meilleurs ingrédients que l'homme n'ait jamais trouvés ?

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Yes, yes!\. Exactly what I wanted, perfect!\. Just you wait, I will put it to good use immediately!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Oui, oui !\. C'est exactement ce que je voulais, parfait !\. Attends un peu, je me mets directement au travail !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Ms. Teak
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mme Teak

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Mhmmmm...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Mmmmm...
Je...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: ...oh my...
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: ... oh mon...

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: By the Ancients!\. This... this might be the best piece of meat that has ever grazed this planet.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Par les Anciens !\. C'est... c'est peut-être le meilleur morceau de viande que cette planète n'ait jamais connue !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Truly gal, I'm serious.\. You gotta taste some of this.\. This is perfect.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Vraiment, je suis sérieuse.\. Il faut que tu goûtes ça.\. C'est juste parfait.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Here, take a few to enjoy.\. But make sure to brace yourself when eating!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Tiens, prend en un peu et savoure-les.\. Mais attention, cette saveur céleste est littéralement à tomber par terre !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: I will make sure to stock up my booth right now.\. There'll be as many as you can eat!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Je vais faire en sorte de me réapprovisionner.\. Tu verras, il y en aura autant que tu pourras en manger !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Thank you again for all the hard work.\. I hope to "meat" you again, many times in the future.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Encore merci pour tout le travail que tu as fait.\. J'espère qu'on se rencontrera encore plus souvent.

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.orig: Bye!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/39.text: Bye !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.text: Ze ne peux pas le supporder ! Z'est Indézent !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.orig: Go she to Zergeant Brassler and tell him that she cannot accebt his authority as ein policeman!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.text: Allez voir le Zergent Brassler et dides lui que vous n'azzeptiez bas zon audoridé comme ein bolizier !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.orig: Because he is missing ein correct coattail!\. Jawohl!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.text: Parce qu'il ne zait pas z'habiller avec un pan digne de ze nom !\. Jawohl !
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.note: coattail ? pan ? de: ne sait pas porter son autorité, ou un truc du genre

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.orig:
He won't lissen to me, alzough the perfectly correct distance of my bottom puttons 
clearly displays my knolletsch of zee matter.
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.text: Et de moi il ne veut rein n'endendre, alors que la dizdance réglemendaire endre mes boudons mondre bien que je zais de quoi je barle !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.orig: How dares she to address me!
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.text: Comment oze d'elle z'addrézzer à moi ainzi !

maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.orig: Zinks she that she is the Kaiser of Preussen becourse she has not only wann, but two spikes on her head?
maps/rookie-harbor/west.json/entities/40.text: Elle penze beud-êdre qu'elle est l'Impéradrize des Brusses parce qu'elle pozzède non bas ein, mais deux piques sur za dête !
